itunes:title: High School Teacher Proves Conspiracy Theories
title: High School Teacher Proves Conspiracy Theories
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
description:
World War 2 crocodile attacks, American conspiracies, botched assassination attempts, taking a history quiz and more! We have a high school history teacher, Mr. W., come by to teach us everything we forgot to pay attention to.


Check out Mr. W's podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lads-who-pod/id1617687015


Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA


Follow our Podcast on Instagram: @lightweightspod https://www.instagram.com/lightweightspod/

Follow Joe on Instagram: @ughitsjoe https://www.instagram.com/ughitsjoe/

Follow Ilya on Instagram: @ilyafeddy https://www.instagram.com/ilyafeddy/

Follow us on Tik Tok @lightweightspod
